## Some technical details

Upon triggering [SystemTransition::exec](https://svnweb.cern.ch/trac/cactus/browser/trunk/cactuscore/swatch/core/src/common/SystemStateMachine.cpp#L227)
[StateMachine::Transition::exec](https://svnweb.cern.ch/trac/cactus/browser/trunk/cactuscore/swatch/core/src/common/StateMachine.cpp#L266) is called
and extract the configuration parameters from the [GateKeeper](https://svnweb.cern.ch/trac/cactus/browser/trunk/cactuscore/swatch/core/include/swatch/core/GateKeeper.hpp)
container class by means of a function in [CommandVec](https://svnweb.cern.ch/trac/cactus/browser/trunk/cactuscore/swatch/core/src/common/CommandVec.cpp#L244) parent class.

As of now the [GateKeeper]() container can also be initialized from a DB table:

<img class=center src=prove.png height=280>

<br>

That only requires a simple change in [SetupPanel](https://svnweb.cern.ch/trac/cactus/browser/trunk/cactuscore/swatchcell/framework/src/common/SetupPanel.cc#L627) class
